entry.summary: RT ‎ lu—an Δ if you exist at the infrastructure layer of a DAO, you want as lean a tech stack as is humanly possible. there’s a lot of moving parts, and a convoluted backend will inevitably translate to the member UX. this is why interoperability is important, when vetting platforms
